item.title: Outside number 103, 12th January
item.description:
I reported this last week under ref 8645869. I was told "insufficient information" So now I have taken a photo and inspected it myself. It is a rolled up and packaged spring mattress. It has been in this location for at least three weeks. I hope the guys can remove it now Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
